item.title: Starmer apologises to Epstein victims for believing Mandelson's 'lies'
item.description: The PM says the depth of the pair's relationship was not known when he was appointed US ambassador.

item.title: Israeli intelligence chief's brother charged with smuggling cigarettes into Gaza
item.description: Bezalel Zini, an Israeli military reservist on active duty, is accused of smuggling 14 cartons of cigarettes in exchange for $117,000.

item.title: Russia and Ukraine exchange prisoners as peace talks end without breakthrough
item.description: The swap - the first since October - sees 157 Ukrainians and 160 Russians returned home.

item.title: Lebanon says Israel sprayed southern villages with concentrated herbicide
item.description: Israel declines to comment on the allegation its planes sprayed glyphosate over an area with extensive farmland.

item.title: Dozens of Muslims 'massacred' in Nigeria for refusing to join jihadists, says governor
item.description: At least 78 bodies have been buried, while there are fears that around 170 people were killed altogether.
